summary: A woman meets a man whose love she rejected years ago.
cast: Ann Todd|Claude Rains|Trevor Howard|Betty Ann Davies|Isabel Dean|Arthur Howard|Guido Lorraine|Marcel Poncin|Natasha Sokolova|Hélène Burls|Jean Serret|Frances Waring|Wenda Rogerson|Helen Piers|Ina Pelly|John Huson|John Unwin|Max Earle|Wilfrid Hyde-White|Amy Dalby|Lisa Daniely|Charles Lloyd Pack
title: Amigos apasionados
